resources.string: Your RoyaltyRyde Points have reached a new milestone! 1000 points! Your efforts have been rewarded with sponsored data to watch Game of Thrones: Season V!
For today only, come in to any Subway for a free drink with your \'Dragon Toasted Footlong,\' PLUS you will earn 100 points toward unlocking this weeks GoT Season V sponsored data \'super reward\'.
take me to the nearest location
By stopping into a local Subway you will unlock a webisode of the Game of Thrones. Your data stream free.
